section.section: Notwithstanding §§ 10-611 through 10-628 of the State Government Article, and subject to § 12-408.1 of this subtitle, the Commissioner shall report adjudicated enforcement actions against a money transmitter or its authorized delegate and other relevant information to the nationwide licensing system.

The Commissioner shall adopt regulations establishing a process by which a licensee or an applicant for a license may challenge information entered by the Commissioner into the nationwide licensing system.

text.section: The Commissioner may submit to the nationwide licensing system information regarding enforcement actions against persons engaged in the money transmission business who are not licensees or authorized delegates.
